typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvinceCode as string,
		StateProvinceName as string,
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		EnglishCountryRegionName as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceGeography
source(output(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceHUBGeography
SourceGeography derive(HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(256, GeographyAlternateKey),
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF = sha2(256, GeographyAlternateKey,City,StateProvinceCode,StateProvinceName,CountryRegionCode,EnglishCountryRegionName,PostalCode),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp()) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, SourceHUBGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == SourceHUBGeography@HUB_Geography_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckNewGeography
